title: The One-Second Success Story of Venera 7

media:group.media:title: The One-Second Success Story of Venera 7
media:group.media:description:
Venus may have been named after the Roman goddess of beauty, but once humans started sending spacecraft to the planet next door, we quickly learned that beautyâ€¦ hurts.
Get your own Venera 7 pin at DFTBA Records: http://dftba.com/scishow

Hosted by: Savannah Geary
